'''v0.8.0 alpha''' is a major update to ''[[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' that was released on December 12, 2013. It added new blocks, items, crops, and other features, as well as some changes and fixes.

=== Blocks ===
'''{{Animate|Spruce Planks JE1 BE1.png;Birch Planks JE1 BE1.png;Jungle Planks JE1 BE1.png|32px}}{{Animate|Spruce Slab JE1 BE1.png;Birch Slab JE1 BE1.png;Jungle Slab JE1 BE1.png|32px}}{{Animate|Spruce Stairs (N) JE2 BE1.png;Birch Stairs (N) JE2 BE1.png;Jungle Stairs (N) JE2 BE1.png|32px}} [[Wood planks]], [[slab]]s, and [[stairs]]'''
* Added spruce, birch, and jungle varieties.
* Each one can only be crafted with their respective wood type.
* Jungle variants are unobtainable in Survival mode.
'''[[File:Block of Coal JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Block of coal]]'''
* Can be crafted with nine [[coal]].
* Can be used as fuel in a furnace, smelting up to 80 items.
'''{{Animate|White Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Light Gray Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Gray Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Black Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Brown Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Red Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Orange Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Yellow Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Lime Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Green Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Cyan Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Light Blue Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Blue Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Purple Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Magenta Carpet JE1 BE1.png;Pink Carpet JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Carpet]]s'''
* Thin blocks that can be used as decoration.
* Red carpets can be crafted with two red wool blocks.
* The other 15 colors are unobtainable in Survival mode.
'''[[File:Cobblestone Wall (EWU) BE1.png|32px]] [[Wall]]s'''
* Decorative blocks that can be used to create boundaries.
* Comes in cobblestone and mossy cobblestone variants.
* Cobblestone walls can be crafted with six cobblestone.
* Mossy cobblestone walls are unobtainable in Survival mode.
'''[[File:Hay Bale (UD) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Hay bale]]s'''
* Decorative, flammable blocks that serve as compact storage of [[wheat]].
* Can be crafted with nine wheat.
'''[[File:Iron Bars (EW) JE1.png|32px]] [[Iron bars]]'''
* Serve a similar purpose to [[glass pane]]s.
* Can be crafted with six iron ingots.
'''[[File:Carved Pumpkin (S) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Pumpkin]]s'''
* Fruit blocks that grow from fully-grown pumpkin stems.
* Can be crafted into jack o'lanterns, pumpkin pie, or pumpkin seeds.
'''[[File:Jack o'Lantern (S) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Jack o'lantern|Jack 'o' lantern]]s'''
* Solid blocks that provide light.
* Can be crafted with a pumpkin and a torch.
'''[[File:Rail (NS) JE1.png|32px]] [[Rail]]s'''
* Non-solid blocks that provide a path along which minecarts can travel.
* Can be crafted with iron ingots and a stick.
'''[[File:Powered Powered Rail (NS) JE2 BE2.png|32px]] [[Powered rail]]s'''
* A type of rail that increases the velocity of moving minecarts.
* Can be crafted with gold ingots, a stick, and redstone dust.
'''Crops'''
* [[File:Beetroots Age 3 JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Beetroot crop]]s
* [[File:Carrots Age 7 JE6 BE1.png|32px]] [[Carrot crop]]s
* [[File:Potatoes Age 7 JE6 BE1.png|32px]] [[Potato crop]]s
* [[File:Stem Age 7 JE2.png|32px]] [[Pumpkin stem]]s
'''[[File:Jungle Log (UD) BE1.png|32px]] [[Log|Jungle wood]]'''
* Serves as a decorative block.
* Is unobtainable in Survival mode.
'''[[File:Jungle Leaves JE1 BE2.png|32px]] [[Jungle leaves]]'''
* Serve as a decorative block.
* Are unobtainable in Survival mode.
'''[[File:Fern BE1.png|32px]] [[Fern]]s'''
* Aesthetic plants that have the same characteristics as [[grass]].
'''[[File:Dead Bush JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Dead bush]]es'''
* Aesthetic plants that can only be placed on sand.
* Are unobtainable in Survival mode.
'''[[File:Sponge JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Sponge]]s'''
* Currently serve no purpose.
* Are unobtainable in Survival mode.
'''{{Animate|Oak Wood (UD) BE1.png;Spruce Wood (UD) BE1.png;Birch Wood (UD) BE1.png|32px}} [[Bark]]'''
* Currently serves no purpose.
* Is not yet obtainable.
* Only obtainable trough world editors

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Beetroot Seeds JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Beetroot seeds]]'''
* Have a {{frac|1|15}} chance of popping out from grass when tilled.
'''[[File:Minecart JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Minecart]]s'''
* Train-like vehicle entities that run on rails.
* Can be crafted with five iron ingots.
'''[[File:Pumpkin Seeds JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Pumpkin seeds]]'''
* Obtained from the [[nether reactor]].
'''[[File:Redstone Dust JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Redstone]]'''
* Drops from redstone ore when mined with an iron or diamond pickaxe.
* Can be used to craft clocks, compasses, and powered rails.
'''[[Food]]s'''
* [[File:Beetroot JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Beetroot]]s
** Restore {{hp|1}} when eaten.
* [[File:Beetroot Soup JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Beetroot soup]]
** Restores {{hp|8}} when eaten.
* [[File:Carrot JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Carrot]]s
** Restore {{hp|3}} when eaten.
* [[File:Potato JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Potato]]es
** Restore {{hp|1}} when eaten.
* [[File:Pumpkin Pie JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Pumpkin pie]]
** Restores {{hp|8}} when eaten.
* [[File:Baked Potato JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Baked potato]]es
** Restore {{hp|5}} when eaten.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Breeding]]'''
* Feeding animals their respective food items makes them enter "love mode."
** Hearts come out of animals while in love mode.
* When two animals of the same species are in love mode, they pathfind toward each other and produce a baby animal.

=== General ===
'''{{w|Mipmap}}s (iOS only)'''
* Blocks far away from the player have lower resolution textures to make textures smoother at a further distance.
'''[[Settings]]'''
* Added far (8 [[chunk]]s) and farthest (12{{frac|1|2}} chunks) render distances.

== Changes ==

** [[Grass block]]s (top and bottom sides only)
** [[Dirt]]
** [[Sand]]
** [[Leaves]] (top and bottom sides only)
** [[Sponge]]s
** [[TNT]] (top and bottom sides only)
** [[Obsidian]]
** [[Snow block]]s

** [[Clay]]
** [[Netherrack]]
** [[Glowstone]]
** [[Sandstone]] (top and bottom sides only)
** [[Blocks of coal]]

=== Items ===
'''[[Bone meal]]'''
* Now works like {{in|je}}.
* Can grow [[fern]]s and [[grass]] in Survival and Creative.
* [[Pumpkin]] and [[melon]] stems only grow by one when bone meal is used.
* [[Flower]]s now spawn other flowers when bone meal is used.
* Grows [[sugar cane]] to maximum height.
'''[[File:Eating Steve.png|48px]] Eating [[particle]]s'''
* Are shown to look like the food being eaten rather than random pixels from the food.
'''[[Bowl]]s and wooden [[tool]]s (except [[axe]]s)'''
* Can now be used as furnace fuel, smelting 1 item each.
'''[[Magenta dye]]'''
* Can now additionally be crafted with [[pink dye]] and [[purple dye]], or with [[lapis lazuli]], [[rose red]], and pink dye.
'''[[Gray dye]]'''
* Can now be crafted with [[bone meal]] and an [[ink sac]].
** Is still unobtainable in Survival mode due to ink sacs not being obtainable.
'''[[Light gray dye]]'''
* Can now be crafted with bone meal and gray dye, or with two bone meal and an ink sac.
** Is still unobtainable in Survival mode due to ink sacs and gray dye not being obtainable.
'''[[Cocoa beans]]'''
* Can now be crafted with [[orange dye]] and an ink sac, or with [[dandelion yellow]], rose red, and an ink sac.
** Is still unobtainable in Survival mode due to ink sacs not being obtainable.
* Changed texture from [[File:Cocoa Beans JE1 BE1.png|32px]] to [[File:Cocoa Beans JE3 BE2.png|32px]].
'''[[Bow]]'''

=== Mobs ===
'''All [[mob]]s'''
* New visual effect for burning mobs.

'''[[Sheep]]'''
* {{Animate|White Sheep BE4.png;Light Gray Sheep BE3.png;Gray Sheep BE3.png;Black Sheep BE3.png;Brown Sheep BE3.png;Red Sheep BE3.png;Orange Sheep BE3.png;Yellow Sheep BE3.png;Lime Sheep BE3.png;Green Sheep BE3.png;Cyan Sheep BE3.png;Light Blue Sheep BE3.png;Blue Sheep BE3.png;Purple Sheep BE3.png;Magenta Sheep BE3.png;Pink Sheep BE3.png|32px}} {{Animate|Sheared White Sheep JE1.png;Sheared Light Gray Sheep BE1.png;Sheared Gray Sheep BE1.png;Sheared Black Sheep BE1.png;Sheared Brown Sheep BE1.png;Sheared Red Sheep BE1.png;Sheared Orange Sheep BE1.png;Sheared Yellow Sheep BE1.png;Sheared Lime Sheep BE1.png;Sheared Green Sheep BE1.png;Sheared Cyan Sheep BE1.png;Sheared Light Blue Sheep BE1.png;Sheared Blue Sheep BE1.png;Sheared Purple Sheep BE1.png;Sheared Magenta Sheep BE1.png;Sheared Pink Sheep BE1.png|32px}} Now have the color overlay of its wool around its face and when sheared.
'''[[Zombie]]s'''
* Now rarely drop [[carrot]]s and [[potato]]es.
'''[[AI]]'''
* System has been improved. 
** [[Mob]]s can now swim over deep [[water]].
** Hostile mobs are now more intelligent.
'''[[Animal]]s'''
* Follow the player when holding [[wheat]] ([[cow]]s and [[sheep]]), [[wheat Seeds|seed]]s ([[chicken]]s), or [[potato]]es/[[beetroot]]/[[carrot]]s ([[pig]]s).
* [[Baby animal]]s
** Now follow adult animals of their species.
'''[[Spider]]s'''
* Now move faster.

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''Thrown [[egg]]s'''
* Now have a chance of spawning [[baby]] [[chicken]]s instead of adult chickens.
'''[[Falling block]]s'''
* Now drop their item form when falling onto blocks they cannot replace, such as [[torch]]es.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Crafting]]'''
* Craftable recipes are now shown first in the crafting screen.
* If there is 99+ of an item in the inventory, the actual quantity is now shown in the list of craftable items, rather than 99+.
'''[[Inventory]]'''
* Changed the flow of the inventory for the armor/crafting screens so that the back button goes back to the inventory.
* Items that are not supposed to be obtainable no longer have a red background.
* Removed the Xperia Play variant.
* Cannot be navigated with the Xperia Play controller.
'''[[Hotbar]]'''
* Is now transparent.
* When selecting an item in the inventory, it replaces the one in the selected hotbar slot instead of placing it in the leftmost slot and shifting everything to the right.
* Tapping the inventory button now closes the inventory while open.
* Items that are not supposed to be obtainable no longer have a red background.
'''[[Creative]]'''
* Players stop burning as soon as they exit [[fire]]/[[lava]].
* The [[hotbar]] is now saved when exiting a world.
* Mining speed increases at/near mining distance limit (8 blocks per second).
* [[Creative inventory]]
** Has been redesigned, and is now split into four different categories.
** Each category contains the following items, with items added in this update colored <span style="color:darkviolet">purple</span>, items not legitimately accessible before this version colored <span style="color:red">red</span>, and items previously not available in Creative mode colored <span style="color:chocolate">orange</span>:
{{/Creative inventory}}

=== General ===
* The icon has gained the iOS gloss effect if installed on iOS 5 and iOS 6.<ref>https://youtu.be/ljSqkJVAICA?t=23</ref>
'''[[Cloud]]s'''
* Are now 3D.
* Have a new tessellation algorithm.
'''[[Settings]]'''
* Smooth lighting is now always on, and can no longer be disabled.
* Fancy graphics are now on by default.
'''Graphics'''
* Held items are now rendered in 3D, and bob up and down slightly when idle and sway to the side when turning.
* Lighter colored [[sky]] that changes slightly depending on the biome.
** Water fades to non-transparent in the distance (iOS only).
* Refactored most of the rendering to use indexed VBOs.
** Remade the arrow model.
** [[Inventory]] is now rendered using cached VBOs.
** New sky rendering using a triangle fan.
* Separated far and near chunks into two queues for performance reasons.
** Fog only on far chunks.
** Transparency only on near chunks.
** Alpha-test-only layers are hidden in far chunks.
'''[[Lighting]]'''
* All entities now produce circular stencil shadows on blocks below them.
* Lighting on entities is now dynamic and is no longer the same light level on all sides.
* Lighting on each entity is now tinted based on how much sky light and block light is on it.
* Light direction on entities now depends on the position of the sun. This does not affect stencil shadows.
* All lighting changes are only visible when fancy graphics is turned on.
'''Textures'''
* Block textures are now generated with <samp>[[terrain-atlas.tga]]</samp> instead of <samp>[[terrain.png]]</samp>.
* Item textures are now generated with <samp>[[items-opaque.png]]</samp> instead of <samp>[[items.png]]</samp>.
* Inventory icons are now generated with their respective texture atlases instead of <samp>[[gui_blocks.png]]</samp>.
